name: Just Trespassing By
description:
We are Savvy, a team of people exploring new ways of doing Open Education. We get together every week for a 8-hours jam to experiment on the new opportunities in educational resources and collective intelligence.

Join our Discord to help us make good savvy games!

CHEERS!

Made with love by Delphin Casado, Ghislain Mirat, Tom Rivière, Frédéric Urien and the excused sorryness of Lola El Koubi & Juliette Pereira.
